A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The critics are wrong. This is an average sci-fi film but a very poor Star Wars film. I enjoyed Rogue One and The Force Awakens\, both have issues but are masterpieces compared to this mess of a movie. I wanted to love it\, I would have settled for a patchy film but this feels like they have killed off any interest in episode 9 for me anyway.
